DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study ALZT-OP1 Combination Therapy Normal Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This open-labeled , cross-over design , pharmacokinetic study , 24 subject randomly assign receive treatment regimen A-B B-A two consecutive day dose . Two dose group plan study : - Group 1 ( n=12 ) - Group 2 ( n=12 ) Each group admit Phase I Unit even dose initiate dose next morning 2-days consecutive treatment ( A-B , B-A ) . Both group undergo identical study related procedure , except subject consent CSF collection Day 1 dosing . Dose regimen A consist single inhaled oral dose ALZT-OP1a via dry powder inhaler + single oral tablet dose ALZT-OP1b . Dose regimen B consist two oral inhaled dos ALZT-OP1a , 2 minute apart , via dry powder inhaler + two oral tablet dose ALZT-OP1b . Plasma Collection , All Subjects ( n=24 ) 1 mL blood sample collect T : 0 , 5 , 10 , 15 , 30 , 1 hr , 2 hr , 4 hr , 6 hour , follow ALZT-OP1 administration ( Days 1 2 ) . CSF Collection , Sub-group ( n=12 ) A sub-group 12 subject consent CSF collection . 1 mL CSF collect T : 0 , 5 min , 30 min , 2 hr , 4 hour , follow ALZT-OP1 administration ( Day 1 ) .
